titleStmt.title: The Picture of the unfortunate gentlemen, Sir Geruis Eluies, Knight, late leiftenant of his Maiesties Tower of London

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at London in the Black-Friers, by Paul Boulenger,

notesStmt.note: Letterpress verses accompanied by illustration, and enclosed in ornamental border.
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
